_learningOutcomes.outcome: Explain how copyright is applied to intellectual works
Identify whether copyrighted material can be used under exception or open licence
Explain how copyright applies to data and databases
Evaluate the challenges in licensing data collected from third parties
Identify opportunities to apply viral licences
Differentiate between publically available and publicly usable data
Describe how the global legal system affects open data
Examine the potential to use open data as part of a business
Describe a number of companies that are innovating with open data
Analyse the risk in opening up data
Create a business model for an open data startup
Analyse an open data businesses potential and challenges in managing open data projects
